pr_title: Make sure Automatic Download downloads updates that have already been notifiied

timeline.bodyText: I wanted to pull this out so we could have an object that was easier to setup and work with than the SQLiteOpenHelper implementations that need DatabaseContext.
timeline.author: seadowg

timeline.bodyText: This is the key change here: switch away from using the database to record the versions the user is notified about and also making it more of a UI's (the Notifier) concern.
timeline.author: seadowg

timeline.bodyText: There were tests for the database helper checking migrations, but they were out of date and Ignored. Interested to know if people think we need more coverage here.
timeline.author: seadowg

replies.bodyText: I know you've been trying to kill those tests for a long time. 😂 They were added after we had several significant bugs related to onDowngrade. I think the structure and test are good but that it would be good to also downgrade from a fictitious high version with an extra and missing column to avoid regressions there. We can assume we wouldn't touch onDowngrade anymore but it's hard to reason about and tempting to try to improve.
replies.author: lognaturel

replies.bodyText: haha yeah totally happy to add more. The old tests were failing and needed rewritten anyway. I'll add a couple of downgrade tests (one with extra and one with missing columns).
replies.author: seadowg

timeline.bodyText: Move break down to allow upgrades from versions other than 8.
timeline.author: lognaturel

replies.bodyText: Oh damn. Yes. I might try and add some tests to drive this out.
replies.author: seadowg

timeline.message: Move database repo implementations to database package
Make sure form updates are downloaded during auto updated
Make sure notifications for updates aren't sent twice
Remove last detected version hash from form domain
Move form database migration code to its own class
Add test for current version migration
Remove last detected form version column
Move database helpers to top level of package
Add tests for onDowngrade in migrator
Make sure upgrade from 7 to 9 database works

Remove Timber logging

Given this was just an `i` it didn't feel like it had much value
Move database repo implementations to database package
Make sure dbs are closed after test runs
Make sure dbs are closed after test runs
